data.title: FM/Long Island Promotes Rob Rush, Brian Orlando
data.meta_description: RADIO ONLINE offers the latest radio industry news, radio show prep, radio promotions, radio station data and more. RADIO ONLINE has been serving the radio industry since 1989, with up-to-the-minute news at radio-online.com
data.text:
WWSK-FM/Long Island Promotes Rob Rush, Brian Orlando

RADIO ONLINE | Wednesday, October 31, 2018

Connoisseur Media/Long Island elevates 15-year station vet Rob Rush as Program Director of WWSK (94.3 The Shark). He had served as the served as Music Director for Rock outlet since August, 2017 and before that Production Director/nights. Concurrently, morning show host Brian Orlando is named Assistant Program Director.

Rush said, "We'll continue to be Everything That Rocks... and then some. I work with really awesome people, and we keep it grassroots, and are very involved with our listeners and the local communities we serve."

Orlando added, "94.3 The Shark has provided me the most and best opportunities of my career. I look at this as the next great adventure."

Senior VP/Regional Strategy and Long Island Market Manager Jim Condron commented, "It is always a pleasure to be able to recognize and reward talents like Rob and Brian, both of these men live and breathe "The Shark". We are very fortunate to have two such talented individuals expanding their roles with us."

"It's always exciting to see people rewarded for their passion and forward thinking. Rob and Orlando have long demonstrated that type of dedication. We are thrilled about their expanded roles working with Operations Manager Patrick Shea to execute and guide our brand strategy," said Connoisseur Media Director of Brand Management Michelle Stevens.
